Item ID7449

The meat tenderiser is a melee kitchen weapon that can be bought from the Culinaromancer's Chest. To wield it, the player must have completed all 8 Recipe for Disaster subquests, and the final battle (it may be purchased, but not wielded, before completing the final battle).

This weapon has almost the same stats as a rune warhammer, however it requires level 40 Attack instead of Strength, being left out in the first 2021 equipment rebalance. Although it is held over the player's shoulder similarly to a two-handed sword, it is a one-handed weapon and can be used with a shield.

[[File:Meat tenderiser detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''meat tenderiser''' is a [[melee]] [[kitchen weaponry|kitchen weapon]] that can be bought from the [[Culinaromancer's Chest]]. To wield it, the player must have completed all 8 [[Recipe for Disaster]] subquests, ''and'' the [[Recipe for Disaster/Defeating the Culinaromancer|final battle]] (it may be purchased, but not wielded, before completing the final battle).

This weapon has almost the same stats as a [[rune warhammer]], however it requires level 40 [[Attack]] instead of [[Strength]], being left out in the [[Update:Fishing Trawler Improvements and Equipment Rebalance: Part One|first 2021 equipment rebalance]]. Although it is held over the player's shoulder similarly to a [[two-handed sword]], it is a one-handed weapon and can be used with a [[shield]].
